work_experience.text:
-  Present  (2 years 8 months)

I'm a software engineer on the Data Engineering team at Airbnb, working on visualization and data
 tools. 

During this time, I've worked on our experimentation platform, and open sourced: https://
github.com/airbnb/knowledge-repo

I also spoke about this at Grace Hopper Conference 2016.

Software Engineering Intern at Airbnb
June 2014  -  August 2014  (3 months)

I was a software engineering intern on the Data Science team at Airbnb. I worked on creating
 different types of visualizations, including heat maps and monitor dashboards, abstracted plot
 building into a library, and created an internal webpage that showed core company metrics and
 updated weekly.

Parallel and Sequential Data Structures and Algorithms (15-210) Teaching Assistant at Carnegie

(10 months)

I was a TA for this class for two semesters. Responsibilities including modifying existing labs and
 recitations to match this semester's schedule, holding office hours, teaching recitation, and grading
 students' homework.
